posts.content: Hello again, I was looking for the highest AB possible for a sneak with HiPS, ED and SC-V. I know it will be low, just want to get the highest I can with those req. thank you for your time and ideas. lvl 40 and I do not really care about playability 1-40.

Since he dual-wields, his AB is actually 43, not 45, but if you single-wield, you can get the full 45 AB, and maybe use a shield, at the cost of lowering your sneaking skills.

posts.author: campgod
posts.content: Fooled around with those builds and like the Archer the best, However I was wondering If I could combine something like a Ranger 21 Assassin 19 or something along those lines. I play a ranger10/Fighter4/Assassin 26 duel wielder in a PvP setting and he does pretty well. So I was wondering if there was a way to make it better somehow? Is there a way to get BoE and get the DC of the death attacks as high as I can? On the server I play on, Assassin get HiPS at lvl 8 and can take Imp sneak attacks without having rogue or BG lvls. I would like him to be Dex of course. Maybe even get ED in there but not as important as the other stuff. Server lets you craft gear so I can get +12 to any stats, It is a lvl 40 server and the only scrolls/potions around are ones that PC's can make but you have to have a high enough UMD to use the crafted wands of course. I just trying to squeeze more damage and AB. The Ranger10/Fighter4/Assassin26 does well cause of the FE and high DC Death Attacks, sometimes I stun a flat footed PC but most of the time its just high damage. his AB is only 54 with a +6 weapon (that's not counting any buffs or FE's) I just love the sneaks and trying to get better. Prefer a duel wielder but maybe a Dex Archer too? As always thanks for your guys help and thoughts.
